full_summary:
# K8D10-240462 Field Sensors Tender

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting on behalf of the Department of Environment and Climate Change (ECCC) has issued a tender for the procurement of environmental field sensors. The tender aims to acquire three (3) buoy mountable, self-contained sensors for the measurement of phosphate, nitrate, and silicate concentrations in waterbodies.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference ID**: WS4241935655-Documentation#4241953582
* **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (Class C)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Invitation to Tender

## Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date has been set for **November 14, 2023** at **2:00 PM (EST)**. Submissions received after the specified closing date and time will be considered non-responsive.

## Mandatory Requirements

* Bidders are required to supply and deliver one (1) buoy mountable, self-contained phosphate sensor, one (1) buoy mountable, self-contained nitrate sensor, and one (1) buoy mountable, self-contained silicate sensor for integration into existing AXYS Buoy systems.
* Bidders must clearly demonstrate compliance with each mandatory technical criterion.

## Contact Information
If you have any questions or require further clarification, please contact Christopher Harvey, PSPC Post, by email at [christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Access to Tender Documents
The tender documents can be accessed through the public procurement website at [Montréal Gazette Docs](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17744023?extsite=MTc3NDQwMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other agreements as applicable.
